sense.def:
The value of something
je pomembnost ali uporabnost nečesa, na primer lastnosti ali postopka.

seg.quote: Everyone realizes the value of sincerity.
It should have novelty value, if nothing else.

sense.def:
The value of something
je znesek, ki bi ga lahko dobili za tisto, kar je v naši lasti.

seg.quote: What will happen to the value of my property?

sense.def:
The values of a person or group
so moralna načela in prepričanja osebe ali skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: ...the traditional values of civility and moderation.
They have different values from the families they serve.

sense.def:
To value something
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj pomembno in imeti dobro mnenje o tistem.

seg.quote: Which do you value most—wealth or health?

sense.def:
Kadar strokovnjaki
value something
, določijo, koliko je nekaj vredno.

seg.quote: The table silver was valued at £20,000.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
good value
ali
value for money
, je vredno zneska, kolikor stane.

seg.quote: The set lunch is good value at £5.95.

sense.def:
Kar je
of value
, je uporabno ali pomembno.

seg.quote: Nothing of value can be said about this matter.

sense.def:
To put a high value on something
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj zelo pomembno.

seg.quote: He places a high value on educating his children.

sense.def:
To take a remark or action at face value
pomeni sprejeti pripombo ali dejanje brez razmišljanja, kakšen pomen ali namen ima v resnici.

cit.quote: sprejeti nekaj kot resnično ali iskreno

seg.quote: She took the praise at face value.
